global_attributes.comment: Deployment summary: This glider was deployed to the Frontal Zone 1 (FZ-1) line 2019-04-08T01:35:00 UTC and recovered 2019-06-18T10:34:00 UTC. The glider was periodically blown off course by strong currents. This was a normal deployment.

platform.long_name: OOI Coastal Pioneer 1000m Slocum Glider cp_387
